description.zh-cn: 中国京剧女演员，工老生，有“冬皇”之誉，是余派（余叔岩）的优秀传人。
description.en: Chinese female Peking opera artist, specializing in old male roles (laosheng), known as the 'Winter Emperor', and an outstanding successor of the Yu School (Yu Shuyan).

description.zh-cn: 中国近代上海青帮头目、商人。
description.en: Chinese gangster boss of the Green Gang and businessman in Shanghai during the early 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 中国京剧表演艺术家。
description.en: Chinese Peking opera artist.

description.zh-cn: 中国京剧表演艺术家，老生“余派”创始人。
description.en: Chinese Peking opera artist, founder of the 'Yu School' of old male roles (laosheng).

description.zh-cn: 孟小冬的弟子。
description.en: A disciple of Meng Xiaodong.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家、外交官。
description.en: Taiwanese businessman and diplomat.

description.zh-cn: 香港京剧票友，孟小冬的入室弟子。
description.en: Hong Kong Peking opera amateur and a formal disciple of Meng Xiaodong.

description.zh-cn: 中国第一位女性律师。
description.en: The first female lawyer in China.

description.zh-cn: 杜月笙的第四房妻子，京剧演员。
description.en: Du Yuesheng's fourth wife and a Peking opera actress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杜月笙的门生和朋友。
description.en: Chinese political figure, a protégé and friend of Du Yuesheng.

description.zh-cn: 杜月笙与姚玉兰之女。
description.en: Daughter of Du Yuesheng and Yao Yulan.

description.zh-cn: 中国国画家。
description.en: Chinese traditional painter.

description.zh-cn: 杜美霞的丈夫。
description.en: Husband of Du Meixia.

nodes.id: 孟小冬女士国剧奖学基金会

zh-cn: 孟小冬女士国剧奖学基金会

description.zh-cn: 1950年，孟小冬在香港与杜月笙办理结婚手续，成为其妾室，直至1951年杜月笙去世。
description.en: In 1950, Meng Xiaodong married Du Yuesheng in Hong Kong, becoming his concubine until his death in August 1951.

description.zh-cn: 1927年与梅兰芳结合，但此段关系未被梅家正式承认，被视为外室。两人于1931年正式分手。
description.en: She entered into a relationship with Mei Lanfang in 1927, but it was not formally recognized by Mei's family, and she was considered his outside wife. they formally separated in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 孟小冬师承余叔岩，是其门下唯一的女弟子，被公认为“余派”主要传人。
description.en: Meng Xiaodong studied under Yu Shuyan and was his only female disciple, recognized as a primary successor of the 'Yu School'.

description.zh-cn: 赵培鑫是孟小冬的弟子之一。
description.en: Zhao Peixin was one of Meng Xiaodong's disciples.

description.zh-cn: 黄金懋是孟小冬在1953年至1963年间唯一收过的入室弟子。
description.en: Huang Jinmao was the only formal disciple Meng Xiaodong accepted between 1953 and 1963.

description.zh-cn: 辜振甫在香港工作时曾向孟小冬请教京剧艺术。
description.en: Koo Chen-fu consulted Meng Xiaodong on the art of Peking opera while working in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 杜月笙参与调停孟小冬与梅兰芳的分手事宜，最终梅兰芳向孟小冬支付四万块赡养费。
description.en: Du Yuesheng mediated the separation between Meng Xiaodong and Mei Lanfang, which resulted in Mei paying Meng 40,000 yuan in alimony.

description.zh-cn: 孟小冬聘请律师郑毓秀处理与梅兰芳的分手事宜。
description.en: Meng Xiaodong hired lawyer Zheng Yuxiu to handle her separation from Mei Lanfang.

description.zh-cn: 姚玉兰是杜月笙的四房太太，她多次邀请孟小冬移居台湾。孟小冬到台北后，与姚玉兰和其女杜美霞相伴，直至逝世。
description.en: Yao Yulan, Du Yuesheng's fourth wife, repeatedly invited Meng Xiaodong to move to Taiwan. After arriving in Taipei, Meng lived in the company of Yao Yulan and her daughter Du Meixia until her death.

description.zh-cn: 陆京士曾与姚玉兰一同多次邀请孟小冬移居台湾。
description.en: Lu Jingshi, along with Yao Yulan, repeatedly invited Meng Xiaodong to move to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1966年文化大革命爆发后，香港亦受影响，促使孟小冬于1967年迁居台湾。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution broke out in 1966, Hong Kong was affected, prompting Meng Xiaodong to move to Taiwan in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 杜美霞是孟小冬的庶女，两人情同母女，孟小冬晚年在台北与杜美霞相伴直至逝世。
description.en: Du Meixia was Meng Xiaodong's stepdaughter. The two were as close as mother and daughter, and Meng spent her later years in Taipei accompanied by Du until her death.

description.zh-cn: 姚玉兰是杜月笙的第四房妻子。
description.en: Yao Yulan was Du Yuesheng's fourth wife.

description.zh-cn: 为孟小冬的墓碑题字“杜母孟太夫人墓”。
description.en: Inscribed the epitaph 'Tomb of Matriarch Meng, Mother of Du' on Meng Xiaodong's tombstone.

relationships.target: 孟小冬女士国剧奖学基金会

description.zh-cn: 杜美霞生前担任孟小冬女士国剧奖学基金会董事长。
description.en: Before her death, Du Meixia served as the chairperson of the Meng Xiaodong Peking Opera Scholarship Foundation.
